slide.title: Search for the library
slide.blurb:
4 PHP_ARG_WITH(aalib, for aalib support,
 5 [  --with-aalib             Include aalib support])
 6 
 7 if test "$PHP_AALIB" != "no"; then
 8 
 9   SEARCH_PATH="/usr/local /usr"     # you might want to change this
10   SEARCH_FOR="/include/aalib.h"  # you most likely want to change this
11   if test -r $PHP_AALIB/$SEARCH_FOR; then # path given as parameter
12     AALIB_DIR=$PHP_AALIB
13   else # search default path list
14     AC_MSG_CHECKING([for aalib files in default path])
15     for i in $SEARCH_PATH ; do
16       if test -r $i/$SEARCH_FOR; then
17         AALIB_DIR=$i
18         AC_MSG_RESULT(found in $i)
19       fi
20     done
21   fi
22 
23   if test -z "$AALIB_DIR"; then
24     AC_MSG_RESULT([not found])
25     AC_MSG_ERROR([Please reinstall the aalib distribution])
26   fi
